# this is the build file for project core
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(core VERSION 0.0.0 LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(core "")
set_target_properties(core PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "core")
set_target_properties(core PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
add_custom_command(OUTPUT output_core_BCFCB693
    COMMAND echo [  0%]: compiling.headerunit.debug iostream
    COMMAND "C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Community/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.35.32215/bin/HostX64/x64/cl.exe" -nologo -Zi -FS -Fdbuild\windows\x64\debug\compile.core.pdb -Od -std:c++20 /EHsc -external:W0 -external:IC:/dev/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/include -experimental:module -TP -c -exportHeader -headerName:angle iostream -ifcOutput ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/stlmodules/cache/debug -Fo${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/stlmodules/cache/debug/iostream.ifc.obj

    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/system

    COMMAND echo [  0%]: compiling.module.debug system
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/system
    COMMAND "C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Community/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.35.32215/bin/HostX64/x64/cl.exe" -nologo -Zi -FS -Fdbuild\windows\x64\debug\compile.core.pdb -Od -std:c++20 /EHsc -external:W0 -external:IC:/dev/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/include -experimental:module -TP -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/system/system.cppm -Fo${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/system/system.cppm.obj -ifcOutput ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/core/windows/x64/debug/rules/modules/cache/a3ee9253/system.ifc -interface -headerUnit:angle iostream=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/stlmodules/cache/debug/iostream.ifc

    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/system

    COMMAND echo [  0%]: compiling.module.debug service
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/service
    COMMAND "C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Community/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.35.32215/bin/HostX64/x64/cl.exe" -nologo -Zi -FS -Fdbuild\windows\x64\debug\compile.core.pdb -Od -std:c++20 /EHsc -external:W0 -external:IC:/dev/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/include -experimental:module -TP -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/service/service.cppm -Fo${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/service/service.cppm.obj -ifcOutput ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/core/windows/x64/debug/rules/modules/cache/16a8140b/service.ifc -interface -headerUnit:angle iostream=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/stlmodules/cache/debug/iostream.ifc
    VERBATIM
)
add_custom_target(target_core_BCFCB693
    DEPENDS output_core_BCFCB693
)
add_dependencies(core target_core_BCFCB693)
target_include_directories(core PRIVATE
    C:/dev/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/include
)
target_compile_options(core PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-experimental:module>
)
set_source_files_properties(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/main.cpp PROPERTIES COMPILE_OPTIONS
    "$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-TP>;$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-c>;$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/main.cpp>;$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-Fo${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/main.cpp.obj>;$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-headerUnit:angle>;$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:iostream=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/stlmodules/cache/debug/iostream.ifc>;$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-reference>;$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:service=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/core/windows/x64/debug/rules/modules/cache/16a8140b/service.ifc>;$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-reference>;$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:system=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/core/windows/x64/debug/rules/modules/cache/a3ee9253/system.ifc>"
)
set_target_properties(core PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(core PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(core PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(core PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(core PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(core PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET core PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(core PRIVATE
    efsw
)
target_link_libraries(core PRIVATE
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/service/service.cppm.obj
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/system/runtime.cppm.obj
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/system/system.cppm.obj
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/core/windows/x64/debug/src/system/watcher.cppm.obj
)
target_link_directories(core PRIVATE
    C:/dev/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/lib
)
target_sources(core PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
